title: Drawing, "Buthold (Fino) Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: E. McKnight Kauffer.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: Buthhold
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A man dressed in a brown tunic with a blue belt, a black cape on his shoulders. He stands frontally with his head turned three-quarter view, and has cropped black hair.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Buthold (Fino) Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925.
1925. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-172.
